title: "Violin+boxplot"
output: html_notebook

library(readxl)
library(ggplot2)
library(ggpubr)
library(viridisLite)
library(ggbeeswarm)

df <- read_excel("C:/Users/bruno/Downloads/path_lengh_5dai.xlsx",
                  sheet     = "PÃ¡gina1",
                  col_names = TRUE)
df <- df[!is.na(df$Path) & !is.na(df$Group), ]

df$Group <- factor(df$Group, levels = c("Ctrl", "OGA", "OGT"))


# Graphic, I've put Notch false because I didn't have a big n, if I had, Notch=TRUE
ggplot(df, aes(x = Group, y = Path, fill = Group)) +
  geom_violin(
    color  = NA,
    alpha  = 0.5,
    trim   = FALSE,
    width  = 0.8
  ) +
  geom_boxplot(
    width         = 0.15,
    notch         = TRUE,
    outlier.shape = NA,
    color         = "black",
    alpha         = 0.7,
    lwd           = 1.2,
    show.legend   = FALSE
  ) +
  geom_quasirandom(
    shape       = 21,
    size        = 2,
    color       = "black",
    dodge.width = 0.8,
    alpha       = 0.8,
    show.legend = FALSE
  ) +
  scale_fill_manual(
    values = c("Ctrl" = "green3", "OGA" = "black", "OGT" = "magenta")
  ) +
  coord_cartesian(ylim = c(0, 400)) +
  labs(x = "Grupo", y = "Path") +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(
    axis.line  = element_line(color = "black", size = 0.8),
    axis.ticks = element_line(color = "black", size = 0.8),
    axis.text  = element_text(size = 12, color = "black"),
    axis.title = element_text(size = 14)
  ) +
  guides(fill = guide_legend(override.aes = list(alpha = 1, color = "black")))
